records.title: 📆 Announcing ChatBottle Facebook Bot
records.subtitle: ChatBottle team stated working on ChatBottle Bot for Facebook Messenger that will fix Facebook bot discovery problem.

records.title: 📺 ChatBottle Awards on BotCast #6 📺
records.subtitle: David Pichsenmeister and Peter M. Buch on BotCast #6 talking about the winners of 1st ChatBottle Awards.

records.title: 😎 Announced the winners of 1st ChatBottle Awards 🤖
records.subtitle:
From January 9 to January 18 more than 2500 people from 65 countries voted 5373 times for the best travel, productivity, social, e-commerce, entertainment, and news chatbots!

The winners are Instalocate, Meekan, Foxsy, BFF Trump, chatShopper, TechCrunch and Swelly

records.title: 🏆 Launching 1st ChatBottle Awards 🏆
records.subtitle: We asked 15-20 influencers in the bot space for the nominees. Once the list of chatbots is ready the voting started on https://chatbottle.co.

records.title: ✈ ChatbotConf 2016 🕴
records.subtitle: Visiting the biggest chatbot conference of 2016 in Vienna

records.title: 🔎 ChatBottle API v2 🔎
records.subtitle: Launching the ChatBottle API v2 as part of ChatBottle Ranking Algorithms.

records.title: 💰 $25k from Microsoft! 💲
records.subtitle: ChatBottle won $25k as a special prize from Microsoft at Startup Hub Poland demo day! Yahoooooo!!!!

records.title: 🚀 Startup Hub Warsaw 2016 🚀
records.subtitle: ChatBottle is joining Startup Hub Warsaw acceleration program!

records.title: 3️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ bots on ChatBottle
records.subtitle: ChatBottle Search Engine indexed 300 Facebook, Slack and Telegram chatbots

records.title: 🐱 Product Hunt! 🐱
records.subtitle: ChatBottle is trending on ProductHunt. Thanks Marius Lian for hunting us!

records.title: ⚙ Ranking algorithms updates: Product Hunt! 🔩
records.subtitle: Starting from Jule 20 Product Hunt votes and comments are taking into account by ChatBottle Ranking algorithms.

records.title: 💯 Hello world! 💯
records.subtitle: Soft launched the first version of ChatBottle with ~200 Messenger, Slack and Telegram bots
